topics.title: Healthcare Reform
topics.description: Should the government implement universal healthcare?

candidates.name: Alice Johnson
candidates.character: Progressive left-leaning, prioritizes social programs and government intervention

initial_policy_positions.topic_1: Absolutely! As Alice Johnson, I firmly believe healthcare is a fundamental right, not a privilege. I advocate for universal healthcare through a single-payer system, often called "Medicare for All". This will ensure everyone has access to quality care, regardless of their income or pre-existing conditions, and will simplify the system and drive down costs.

candidates.name: Bob Smith
candidates.character: Conservative right-leaning, values free market and limited government

initial_policy_positions.topic_1: Healthcare is a critical issue, and the current system needs reform. I believe the best approach is a free-market solution, encouraging competition among providers and empowering individuals with choices. Government-mandated universal healthcare leads to inefficiency and higher costs; instead, we should focus on removing barriers to entry and promoting individual responsibility in healthcare decisions.

demographics.name: Tammy Pena
demographics.job: Marbrier du bâtiment CFC (Champ professionnel travail de la pierre)

demographics.name: Pánfilo Roca Benavente
demographics.demeanour: Patient and steady-handed, dedicated to achieving flawless surface finishes.
demographics.backstory: Born 1963 in Spain, he moved to Switzerland in his youth and earned his VET attestation. He has worked as a specialist polisher in the Swiss watch industry for over 40 years.

demographics.name: Yildiz Sezgin
demographics.demeanour: Energetic and organized, adept at managing staff and ensuring high standards.
demographics.backstory: Born 1994 in Zurich to Turkish parents; entered the hospitality industry after high school. Promoted to manager at age 27, she successfully increased her restaurant's profitability by 15% in 2023.

demographics.name: José Faria-Melo
demographics.demeanour: Empathetic and studious, eager to apply academic knowledge in practice.
demographics.backstory: Born 2003; completed his BSc in Psychology in 2024. Currently working as a research assistant at a university while applying for Master's programs in clinical psychology.

demographics.backstory: Born 1982; obtained a BA in Social Sciences in 2005. Has been an adult education instructor for over 15 years, specializing in language and professional integration courses.

demographics.demeanour: Technically proficient and persuasive, committed to sustainable energy solutions.
demographics.backstory: Born 1997. Completed a federal diploma in HVAC in 2017, then earned an NDS HF in energy advising in 2023. He now advises commercial clients on efficiency retrofits, managing over 20 projects in 2024.

demographics.demeanour: Meticulous, patient, and highly organized in managing field research data.
demographics.backstory: Earned an MSc in Agronomy from ETH Zurich in 2017. Has worked as a field trials officer since 2018, managing research protocols for new agrochemicals.

demographics.backstory: Born 2000 in Lyon, France; graduated with a BA in Fashion Design from a Milanese institute in 2022. She now works for an established fashion house in Ticino, contributing to their ready-to-wear collections.

demographics.name: Florian Chapuis
demographics.demeanour: Patient and insightful, with a methodical and evidence-based therapeutic approach.
demographics.backstory: Earned his Master's in Psychology c. 2004; has been practicing as a licensed clinical psychologist for nearly 20 years. He runs a private practice in Locarno, specializing in anxiety disorders.

demographics.demeanour: Methodical and enthusiastic, with a passion for fieldwork and data analysis.
demographics.backstory: Born circa 2002; graduated with an MSc in Geophysics from ETH Zurich in 2024. Joined a geological consulting firm, now working on seismic hazard assessments for infrastructure projects.

demographics.demeanour: Creative and user-centric with a strong focus on aesthetic functionality.
demographics.backstory: Born 1984; he obtained his industrial design degree from a Turkish university before moving to Switzerland. For the last 15 years, he has worked as a product designer, contributing to several award-winning consumer electronics.

demographics.demeanour: Empathetic and patient, with a calm and encouraging communication style.
demographics.backstory: Moved to Switzerland to study social work with a focus on creative therapies. Works part-time as a music therapy assistant at a local clinic while completing her degree.

demographics.backstory: Born 1993; her family emigrated from Kosovo in the late 1990s. She earned a Master's in Art Therapy in 2019 and works in community health, focusing on youth mental health.

demographics.backstory: Born 1987 in St. Gallen; completed his MSc in Business and Law in 2011. He has specialized in cross-border taxation for SMEs for over a decade, gaining his tax expert certification in 2018.

demographics.name: Mathilde du Bouvier
demographics.demeanour: Articulate and deadline-driven, with a keen ear for compelling audio content.
demographics.backstory: Born 1992; earned her MA in Media Studies from the University of Zurich in 2016. Joined a major public broadcaster as a radio producer in 2018, recently leading a successful digital content initiative.

demographics.name: Anja Vollbrecht
demographics.demeanour: Observant and principled, with a strong commitment to wildlife conservation.
demographics.backstory: Born 2000; she pursued her passion for nature, earning her federal diploma as a fish and game warden in 2022. She now patrols the Lake Geneva shoreline, focusing on conservation and regulatory enforcement.

demographics.name: Tiziana Ranzoni
demographics.demeanour: Empathetic and encouraging, dedicated to patient rehabilitation and mobility.
demographics.backstory: Born 1976 in Ticino; BSc Physiotherapy 1998. Has run a private practice in Locarno since 2008, specializing in post-surgical recovery.
